name: rattled

effect.scarlet-violet: This Pokémon's Speed rises one stage with each hit from a damaging dark-, ghost-, or bug-type move.
effect.the-teal-mask: This Pokémon's Speed rises one stage with each hit from a damaging dark-, ghost-, or bug-type move.
effect.the-indigo-disk: This Pokémon's Speed rises one stage with each hit from a damaging dark-, ghost-, or bug-type move.

short_effect: Raises Speed one stage upon being hit by a dark, ghost, or bug move.

flavor_text.scarlet-violet: The Pokémon gets scared when hit by a Dark-, Ghost-, or Bug-type attack or if intimidated, which boosts its Speed stat.
